products.title: Bella Grey Whisper (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bella grey whisper (blackout) perfect fit blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality perfect fit blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 330mm max width: 1400mm
 	min drop: 165mm max drop: 1200mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
